masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"There's this... thing in the mall. Everyone who gets near it just becomes SAD. Like, existentially sad. All the Christmas joy just... drains out of them. I saw it touch someone and they started crying about 'the meaninglessness of consumer holidays.' It's FEEDING on our happiness!"

Requirements

  • Confront the Christmas Spirit Vampire
  • Protect shoppers from its draining touch
  • Find a way to defeat a creature that feeds on joy
